game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Find the lost relic of Serendip
game.description: The kingdom of Serendip has lost its sacred relic. The king has sent out a call for adventurers to find it. The relic is said to be located in the ruins of the Old Town, overrun by monsters.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a knight title
